detail_desc:
The wizard looks old and senile, and yet he looks like a very powerful
wizard.  He is equipped with fine clothing, and is wearing many fine
rings and bracelets.
long_desc: A wizard walks around behind the counter, talking to himself.

detail_desc:
A fat, nice looking baker.  But you can see that he has many scars on his
body.
long_desc: The baker looks at you calmly, wiping flour from his face with one hand.

detail_desc: A tall grocer, who moves two 200 pounds bag of flour around on his shoulders.
long_desc: A grocer stands at the counter, with a slightly impatient look on his face.

detail_desc:
He is a young weaponsmith, who still has lots to learn but he is still
eager to sell you his latest implements of carnage and destruction.
long_desc: A weaponsmith is standing here.

detail_desc:
An old but very strong armourer.  He has made more suits of armour in his
life than you have ever seen.
long_desc: An armourer stands here displaying his new (and previously owned) armours.

detail_desc:
You notice a tired look in her face.  She looks like she isn't paid well
enough to put up with any crap from mud players with attitudes.
long_desc: A receptionist is standing behind the counter here, smiling at you.

detail_desc: This captain has eaten more sharks than you have killed peas.
long_desc: A retired captain stands here, selling boats.

detail_desc: He looks like a strong, fit sailor.
long_desc: A sailor stands here, waiting to help you.

detail_desc: He looks like he may or may not have a green card.
long_desc: Uncle Juan is here ready to take your order.

detail_desc:
Wally is a bit pudgy but looks very strong.  He has a glass of Midgaard
Natural Spring Water in his hand.  When he notices you, he proudly
displays his fine collection of contemporary waters.
long_desc: Wally the Watermaster is standing behind the counter.

detail_desc:
The Postmaster seems like a happy old man, though a bit sluggish.  He
worries about the reputation of the MMS (Midgaard Mail Service), as many
people seem to think that it is slow.  Perhaps if he were to brush the
cobwebs from his uniform it would help to make a better impression.
long_desc: The head postmaster is standing here, waiting to help you with your mail.

detail_desc:
Even though your guildmaster looks old and tired, you can clearly see the
vast amount of knowledge she possesses.  She is wearing fine magic clothing,
and you notice that she is surrounded by a blue shimmering aura.
long_desc: Your guildmaster is studying a spellbook while preparing to cast a spell.

detail_desc:
You are in no doubt that this guildmaster is truly close to your God; he
has a peaceful, loving look.  You notice that he is surrounded by a white
aura.
long_desc: Your guildmaster is prayer to your God here.

detail_desc:
You realize that whenever your guildmaster moves, you fail to notice it -
the way of the true thief.  She is to be dressed in poor clothing, having
the appearance of a beggar.
long_desc: A beggar is sitting here, could she be a guildmaster?

detail_desc:
This is your master. Big and strong with bulging muscles. Several scars
across his body proves that he was using arms before you were born. He
has a calm look on his face.
long_desc: Your guildmaster is standing here sharpening an axe.

detail_desc:
He is an experienced mage who has specialized in the field of Combat Magic.
He is here to guard the Mage's Guild and his superior knowledge of offensive
as well as defensive spells make him a deadly opponent.
long_desc: A sorcerer is guarding the entrance.

detail_desc:
He is a specially trained warrior belonging to the military order of the
Faith.  His duty is to protect the faithful from persecution and infidel
attacks and his religious devotion combined with his superior skill makes
him a deadly opponent.
long_desc: A knight templar is guarding the entrance.

detail_desc:
He is a thief who has specialized in killing others as effectively as
possible, using all sorts of weapons.  His superior knowledge of how
and where to use them combined with his extraordinary stealth makes
him a deadly opponent.
long_desc: An assassin is guarding the entrance.

detail_desc:
He is an expert warrior who has attained knighthood through countless
chivalrous deeds.  His duty is to protect the Guild of Swordsmen and his
extreme skill combined with his experience in warfare makes him a deadly
opponent.
long_desc: A knight is guarding the entrance.

detail_desc: A tired looking Bartender who hates trouble in his bar.
long_desc: A bartender watches you calmly, while he skillfully mixes a drink.

detail_desc: A tired looking waiter.
long_desc: A waiter is going around from one place to another.

detail_desc:
This man was obviously a famous sorcerer in his younger days as you
instantly recognize his face.
long_desc: A man now leads a quiet, peaceful life as a waiter is standing here.

detail_desc:
This waiter almost makes you feel like you should drop to your knees
and begin to worship your God.  Naaah.
long_desc: A waiter who seems to have reached contact with his God is standing here.

detail_desc: Hmmm... wonder where he got that coin he is playing with.
long_desc: A waiter who knows where all his customers keep their money is standing here.

detail_desc:
This guy looks like he could easily kill you while still carrying
quite a few firebreathers.
long_desc: A waiter is here.

detail_desc:
Filthy looks real, ehm, dirty.  He likes to keep his customers happy,
but do not mess with him or else he'll get upset.
long_desc: Filthy is standing here, eager to serve you a special drink.

detail_desc: He looks very strong and wise.  Looks like he doesn't answer to ANYONE.
long_desc: A Peacekeeper is standing here, ready to jump in at the first sign of trouble.

detail_desc: A big, strong, helpful, trustworthy guard.
long_desc: A cityguard stands here.

detail_desc: What a tough job he has.
long_desc: A janitor is walking around, cleaning up.

detail_desc:
The fido is a small dog that has a foul smell and pieces of rotted meat
hanging around his teeth.
long_desc: A beastly fido is mucking through the garbage looking for food here.

detail_desc: He looks pretty mean, and you imagine he'd do anything for money.
long_desc: A mercenary is waiting for a job here.

detail_desc: A drunk who seems to be too happy, and to carry too much money.
long_desc: A singing, happy Drunk.

detail_desc: The beggar looks like she is fed up with life.
long_desc: A beggar is here, asking for a few coins.

detail_desc: The odif is a small god that has been reversed by some dog.
long_desc: An odif yltsaeb is here, walking backwards.

detail_desc: A big, strong, helpful, trustworthy guard.
long_desc: A cityguard is here, guarding the gate.

detail_desc: A horrid looking thing; it is huge, greenish, and looks like the blob.
long_desc: An oozing green gelatinous blob is here, sucking in bits of debris.

detail_desc: As you look at him, he opens his hands to reveal a rat!
long_desc: There is a Pet Shop Boy standing here cuddleing something furry in his hands.

detail_desc: The kitten looks like a cute, little, fierce fighter.
long_desc: A small loyal kitten is here.

detail_desc: The puppy looks like a cute, little, fierce fighter.
long_desc: A small loyal puppy is here.

detail_desc: The beagle looks like a fierce fighter.
long_desc: A small, quick, loyal beagle is here.

detail_desc: The rottweiler looks like a strong, fierce fighter.
long_desc: A large, loyal rottweiler is here.

detail_desc: The wolf looks like a strong, fearless fighter.
long_desc: A large, trained wolf is here.

detail_desc:
You notice a tired look in her face.  She looks like she isn't paid well
enough to put up with any crap from mud players with attitudes.
long_desc: The cryogenicist is here, playing with a canister of liquid nitrogen.
